ns0:Concept.displayName: PROMIS short form - sleep disturbance 6a - version 1.0 raw score
PROMIS short form - sleep disturbance 4a - version 1.0 raw score
PROMIS short form - sleep disturbance 8b - version 1.0 raw score

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: Assessment or evaluation of the disturbance of night-sleep cycles and it's interference with daytime alertness),(Data Element Scope: Maps to the Assessment category of the QDM.),(Inclusion Criteria: Night sleeping behaviors, daytime sleepiness, napping, drowsiness, sleep deprivation interference with ADL),(Exclusion Criteria: Fatigue, exercise, depression)
